popover_supergoals_lifetime: Write 100 Dreams, Desires, and Goals for the Rest of Your Life. Have the Courage to Dream Big. With the Right Level of Action, Dedication, Perseverance, Creativity, and Determination, There is Nothing You Can't Make a Reality!
popover_supergoals_yearly: Everything is 'impossible' until someone makes it Possible. Break your limits and achieve your Most Extraordinary Goals this Year. Take responsibility for your world. Work hard and smart. You can do it!
popover_supergoals_quarterly: Transform and Revolutionize your Life in the Next 90 Days. Decide what is most important and work on it every day. If you can.
popover_supergoals_monthly: Write down the most important Actions or Results you want to achieve this Month. Make this Month the Best Possible. Your Most Extraordinary Achievements are Possible. You can do it!
popover_supergoals_weekly: Write down the most important Actions or Results you want to achieve this Week. Don't let this week go by without doing something extraordinary for yourself or for other people. Yes you can.
popover_dream_wall: Create the 'Dream Wall.' Add images that represent what you want to have or manifest in your life. Empower your mind by looking at this wall every day. Never give up on what is important to you!
popover_dailygoals_1: Every day is a tremendous opportunity to live and serve. Choose the 7 Actions or Results that are most important for you to achieve. Every moment is unique. Make the effort to make today exceptional. If you can.
